headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Lampadati Viseris
content: Los Santos may be an automotive obsessive’s paradise, but you don’t know what true bliss feels like until you’ve sat behind the wheel of a Viseris. Its brutal muscle car looks are only matched by the bladder-quivering roar of its environmentally apocalyptic engine – and if looking and sounding that good aren’t enough for you, try pulling the trigger on a twin machine gun upgrade.
